title: This country is selling Covid-19 vaccines to tourists
description: The country of San Marino is now selling Russia's Sputnik Covid-19 vaccine to tourists. CNN's Delia Gallagher reports.

title: The Sunrise Movement endorses top Sanders ally Nina Turner to fill US House seat in Ohio
description: The Sunrise Movement, a youth-led climate activist group, on Monday announced its endorsement of former Ohio state Sen. Nina Turner, further bolstering her campaign's progressive support ahead of a special election for an open US House seat in Ohio.

title: Euro football roundup: Atlético Madrid closes in on La Liga title with dramatic comeback
description: Atlético Madrid completed a stunning late comeback against Osasuna to move within touching distance of a first La Liga title since 2014.

title: Melting ice in Antarctica could trigger chain reactions, bringing monsoon rains to the ice cap, study says
description: In an ever-warming climate, ripple effects or chain reactions could lead to altered weather patterns across the globe thanks to a melting Antarctic ice sheet, a new study says.

title: This nurse is on a mission to vaccinate an entire island
description: The UK's vaccine rollout is reaching even the most isolated parts of the country. CNN boards a small plane bound for Fair Isle, off the coast of Scotland, along with Margaret Cooper, a nurse on a mission to vaccinate the entire island. CNN's Phil Black reports.

title: Mexico's Andrea Meza crowned this year's Miss Universe
description: Miss Mexico Andrea Meza was crowned Miss Universe at the 69th annual pageant, which was delayed last year due to Covid-19.

title: After the Texas missing tiger saga, owning a big cat as a house pet might become illegal in the US
description: Tales of Bengal tigers on the loose, like the one found roaming a Houston front yard last week, may soon be history if a bipartisan bill becomes law.

title: Those emerging cicadas are giving some people anxiety
description: Rosalie Lacorazza already has lived through two 17-year cicada events and dreads what's coming.

title: Why sexual activity took a pandemic hit, and what to do about it
description: When Covid-19 first hit, I stopped getting as many inquiries from new patients for sex therapy.

title: Miss Universe contestants unveil protest messages in politically charged pageant
description: The Miss Universe stage was lit up with colorful protests as contestants from Singapore, Uruguay and Myanmar used the limelight to unveil messages about political and social issues.

title: Wave of anti-trans bills is 'really alarming,' says transgender motorsport star
description: Anorexia. Depression. Loneliness. If motor racing requires a high level of endurance, then Charlie Martin is well versed in navigating life's twists and turns -- on and off the track.

title: Taiwan was a Covid success story. Now it's fighting its biggest outbreak
description: Taiwan has imposed new restrictions including limits on gatherings in its capital as it battles its biggest coronavirus outbreak since the start of the pandemic last year.

title: What the Maldives looked like before mass tourism
description: The Maldives: turquoise waters, luminous white sands, gorgeous technicolor sunsets and, of course, luxury.

title: Bitcoin drops after Elon Musk fuels speculation that Tesla could dump its holdings
description: Elon Musk has shown he can move markets with just a single word.

title: European leaders seized more power during the pandemic. Few have 'exit plans' to hand it back
description: Hundreds of thousands of people have lost their lives across Europe due to Covid-19, and many more have suffered long-term ill health after contracting the disease. They're not the only casualties of the pandemic.

title: Thousands evacuated as powerful Cyclone Tauktae threatens Indian region grappling with Covid
description: Tens of thousands of people have been evacuated from low-lying areas in western India as a powerful cyclone is expected to make landfall Tuesday, threatening a region already struggling with a devastating second coronavirus wave.

title: Calls are growing for another nationwide India lockdown. That's not realistic
description: Millions of Indians are living under a mix of locally-imposed coronavirus restrictions, as the central government resists calls from leading medical experts for a nationwide lockdown.

title: Train derailment and fire prompts evacuations in northwest Iowa
description: Authorities evacuated parts of Sibley, Iowa, after a train derailment and fire on Sunday.

title: Scenes of horror unfold in Gaza
description:
• A bleacher collapse in an Israeli synagogue is described as a 'mass casualty event'
• Analysis: The latest violence will end when both sides can declare victory. But it will be no more than a truce.
• How to help victims

title: Modi pushes ahead $2.8 billion parliamentary revamp
description: While hospitals plead for life-saving oxygen and Covid-19 patients, India's Prime Minister Narendra Modi is pushing ahead with a $2.8 billion parliamentary revamp -- including a new home for the country's leader. Indians from all sides of politics are questioning whether the spend is necessary in the middle of the a Covid-19 catastrophe. CNN's Vedika Sud reports.

title: China's space agency just gave the Communist Party a big 100th birthday gift: a rover on Mars
description: China's space agency has an extraordinary gift for the ruling Communist Party's 100th birthday: a rover on Mars.

title: Experts are warning about the unintended consequences of the CDC mask guidance
description: Communities across the US ushered in a quick return to normalcy over the weekend as the country responded to the latest mask guidance from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

title: Scarlett Johansson gets slimed by Colin Jost at MTV Awards
description: Actress Scarlett Johansson was hilariously interrupted during her acceptance speech at the MTV Movie & TV Awards by her husband, comedian Colin Jost. See more highlights from the awards show.

title: America tastes new freedoms but confronts new dilemmas as it takes off the mask
description: Vaccinated Americans spent the most normal weekend for more than a year exploring restored freedoms to gather without masks but also dilemmas over personal and collective responsibility sparked by new government health guidance.

title: Space Force commander fired after comments made on conservative podcast
description: A Space Force lieutenant colonel has been removed from his command after appearing on a conservative podcast criticizing the United States military.

title: Bill Gates faces conduct accusations while navigating divorce
description: Bill Gates's 2020 resignation from Microsoft's board of directors came after the board hired a law firm to investigate a romantic relationship he had with a Microsoft employee, according to new reporting from the Wall Street Journal.

title: GOP congressman calls out 'bogus' claims by colleagues about Capitol riot
description:
• Brian Stelter: This Fox News data proves Liz Cheney right
• Ousted Cheney warns direction of the party is 'dangerous'
• Opinion: Where the GOP got its rage

title: Tennessee governor signs controversial bathroom bill into law
description: Tennessee Gov. Bill Lee signed a so-called controversial bathroom bill into law Friday, according to the state General Assembly website, prompting criticism from those who say the bill is discriminatory toward transgender individuals.

title: China closes its side of Everest over Covid fears, as climbers start to scrap expeditions
description: China has suspended its spring climbing season from the Tibetan side of Mount Everest, the state-run Xinhua News Agency said on Saturday, and climbers have begun to scrap their expeditions on the Nepali side and retreat from the world's tallest peak over Covid-19 concerns.

title: One person killed and three others injured in Toronto shooting
description: At least one person is dead and four others injured after a shooting in a Toronto suburb Sunday, Toronto police said.
